titlepage.titleproper: Guide to George William Whistler, Report to Count Kleinmichel on gauge of track to be used in the St. Petersburg and Moscow Railroad1842, 1944

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Whistler, George William, Report to Count Kleinmichel on gauge of track to be used in the St. Petersburg and Moscow Railroad

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Photostat copy of original manuscript report by George Whistler to Count Kleinmichel on the gauge of track to be used in the St. Petersburg and Moscow Railroad. Also includes typescript copy of the manuscript and a copy of a letter from Ralph Budd offering the copies to the Newberry Library (1944).

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Whistler, George William, Report to Count Kleinmichel on gauge of track to be used in the St. Petersburg and Moscow Railroad, Crerar Ms 193, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Photostat copy of original manuscript report by George Whistler to Count Kleinmichel on the gauge of track to be used in the St. Petersburg and Moscow Railroad. Also includes typescript copy of the manuscript and a copy of a letter from Ralph Budd offering the copies to the Newberry Library (1944)
